Service Details: Provides a wide variety of volunteer positions that include recreational and cultural services opportunities, Kelowna Airport positions, serving on a council or committee, being a Bike to Work team leader, or volunteering with the Community Policing Office. For additional information and to volunteer:- Recreational & Cultural Services: 250.469.8467  - Airport Ambassador/Junior Airport Ambassador Program/Airport Watch Program: airport@kelowna.ca- Councils/Committees: 250.469.8645- Bike to Work Team Leader: events@smarttrips.ca - Community Policing:  250.470.0600
How to Apply: - The application process varies by department- Please contact each for additional information
Address & Map: City Hall1435 Water StKelowna, BC     V1Y 1J4
Accessibility: Fully Accessible - accessible entrance to City Hall is located off Queensway
